Monotype NULL (uni0000)
(uni000D)
SPACE (uni0020)
ZERO WIDTH SPACE (uni200B)
NO-BREAK SPACE (uni00A0)

Advance width

Advance width of hmtx and CFF table should be the same (tolerance 2 units).

This is a TrueType font. This test is only for CFF.

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

glyf

Contours

.notdef should be TOFU.

.notdef has 2 contours. It looks like it is a TOFU.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

hmtx

Advance

ZERO WIDTH SPACE advance width should be 0

Advance width is '0'

Error

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

cmap

FEFF

ZERO WIDTH NO-BREAK SPACE: Missing FEFF in cmap table.

Required for Monotype library. Please add unicode FEFF. Custom work refer to spec.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

cmap

00AD

Soft hyphen 00AD in cmap table.

Soft hyphen is often used in web and in professional print publishing software like Adobe InDesign.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

hmtx

Index 3 and 218

Advance width of nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) should match the space (uni0020) width.

OK: Advance width nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) does match the space (uni0020) width:
260 = 260

Info

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

cmap

uni2009

Advance width of 'thinspace' (uni2009) should be smaller than the width of space (uni0020).

Can not check, because no uni2009 in this font.

Info

Can not check, because no uni200A in this font.

cmap

uni200A

Advance width of 'hairspace' (uni200A) should be smaller than the width of space (uni0020).

Can not check, because no uni200A in this font.

Info

Advance

Error

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Light Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

cmap

FEFF

ZERO WIDTH NO-BREAK SPACE: Missing FEFF in cmap table.

Required for Monotype library. Please add unicode FEFF. Custom work refer to spec.

Pass

Nodes Close to Zones (CFF)

Nodes Close to Zones (CFF)

Info

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Info

This is not a CFF font. Skipped this check.

Index 0

'.notdef' advance width should not be 0.

OK: '.notdef' advance width is 600.

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

post

Index 1

PostScript name should be one of the names:
".null"
"null"
"NULL".

OK: Index 1 = "NULL".

Pass

glyf

Index 1

'NULL' shoiuld have no contours.

'NULL' has 0 contours.

Pass

hmtx

Index 1

'NULL' should have an advance width of 0.

OK: 'NULL' has an advance width of 0.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

post

Index 2

PostScript name should be one of the names:
"nonmarkingreturn"
"CR".

OK: Index 2 = "CR".

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

glyf

Index 2

'CR' should have no contours.

OK: 'CR' has 0 contours.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

hmtx

Index 2

Advance width of 'CR' should match the space width.

OK: 'CR' advance width does match the space width:
260 = 260

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

post

Index 3

PostScript name should be "space"

OK: Index 3 = "space".

Pass

glyf

Index 3

'space' should have no contours.

OK: 'space' has 0 contours.

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

table version 4.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

OK: 'OS/2' table version is: 4.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name and OS/2

MS and Mac NID 21/22 + WWS

If MS and Mac NID 21 and 22 is not set, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

OK: Mac/Mac NID 21/22 is not set and 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS is True.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

'OS/2' usDefaultChar should be 0x0000.

OK: 'OS/2' usDefaultChar is 0x0000.

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Installable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

Info

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Installable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

Info

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

embedding level: Embedding Level = Installable Embedding
no subsetting flag: False
bitmap embedding only flag: False

table version 4.

OK: 'OS/2' table version is: 4.

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Med Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Med Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

name and OS/2

MS and Mac NID 21/22 + WWS

If MS and Mac NID 21 and 22 is not set, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

OK: Mac/Mac NID 21/22 is not set and 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS is True.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Med Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Med Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

OS/2

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '33' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin'

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Serif Tamil ExtraCondensed Thin' ≠ 'Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

name

MS NID 6

'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedExtraLight'

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Serif Tamil ExtraCondensed ExtraLight' ≠ 'Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond ExtLt' (NID 1).

Pass

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

name/head

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Light Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '34' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedLight'

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Light Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Light Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Light Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Light Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Light Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Light Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Serif Tamil ExtraCondensed Light' ≠ 'Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Light' (NID 1).

Pass

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

name/head

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

Error

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '29' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensed'

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensed', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensed', Everything looks good.

Pass

but what do think about this
'Noto is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

name

Error

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

Error

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Serif Tamil ExtraCondensed' ≠ 'Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond' (NID 1).

Pass

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Demi, Extra, Dm, Ex, Semi, Ultra, Sm, Xtra, X'

Pass

'Noto Serif Tamil ExtraCondensed Medium'

name

name/head

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

Error

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Med Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '35' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedMedium'

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Med Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedMedium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Med Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedMedium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Med Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Med Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Med Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Med Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Serif Tamil ExtraCondensed Medium' ≠ 'Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Med' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Med Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond SemBd Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '37' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedSemiBold'

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond SemBd Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedSemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond SemBd Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedSemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond SemBd Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond SemBd Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond SemBd Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond SemBd Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Serif Tamil ExtraCondensed SemiBold' ≠ 'Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond SemBd' (NID 1).

Pass

name

Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedBold', Everything looks good.

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Bold (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Bold (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Bold (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Bold (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Bold (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Serif Tamil ExtraCondensed Bold' ≠ 'Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Bold' (NID 1 + 'Space' + NID 2).

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Bold (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '38' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedExtraBold'

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Serif Tamil ExtraCondensed ExtraBold' ≠ 'Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond ExtBd' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Blk Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '34' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedBlack'

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Blk Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedBlack', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Blk Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedBlack', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

name

Critical

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Blk Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Serif Tamil ExtraCondensed Black' ≠ 'Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Blk' (NID 1).

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

GPOS

kern

The font has GPOS kerning.

kern

-/-

Vertical Metrics

Vertical Metrics

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2 and head

sTypeAsc/Desc and unitsPerEm

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value.

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (1561) match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (1000).

Info

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

hhea

Vertical Metrics

Pull hhea Metrics

hhea.ascent: 1069
hhea.descent: -492
hhea.lineGap: 0

Info

OS2.sTypoDescender: -492
OS2.sTypoLineGap: 0

advanceWidthMax = 2054.

sTypeAsc/Desc and unitsPerEm

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value.

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (1561) match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (1000).

Info

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Blk Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

hhea

Vertical Metrics

Pull hhea Metrics

hhea.ascent: 1069
hhea.descent: -492
hhea.lineGap: 0

Info

PostScript names

PostScript names

Pass

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

OT Features

OT Features

Error

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

GSUB

sinf

If there is a feature subs, then the sinf feature should be there, too. Otherwise InDesign will mark it not existing.

There is a subs feature in the font, but the sinf is missing. Please investigate.

Warning

Noto Serif Tamil ExtCond Thin Regular (NotoSerifTamil-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)
